page.title: 12ST.MARY'S LIFE STYLE
page.content: LIFE STYLE ON SCILLY We did a survey one Thursday morning outside the Co_op we asked some people a few questions about the Life Style on Scilly.We found out that the majority of people went on holiday to the Main Land twice a year there was only one person who didn't go on holiday.The most times someone went was eight times.Most people prefer to go by helicopter than by the boat or Brymon which is a light aircraft firm. We asked some more people to complete our survey, we asked them if they visited the hairdressers.Many answered once every six weeks.One out of seventine does not visit the hairdressers. Next was transport,we asked a few more people who were passing by if they traveLled by bicycle,car,moped, motorbike,lorry,truck,van or walk.
